verses.verse: <S%G3049>Let<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3049>think<s%> of <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> of the <S%G5257>ministers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
<S%G3063%G99999>Moreover<s%> it is <S%G2212>required<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> with <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1519>it<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a very small <S%G1646>thing<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I should be <S%G350>judged<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G442>man<s%>'s <S%G2250>judgment<s%>: <S%G235>Yes<s%>, I <S%G350>judge<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> my own <S%G1683>self<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G4894>know<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> by <S%G1683>myself<s%>; <S%G235>yet<s%> am <S%G1344>I<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5129%G99999>hereby<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G350>judges<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G2919%G99999>judge<s%> <S%G3361>nothing<s%> <S%G4253%G99999>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%>, <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> will bring to <S%G5461>light<s%> the hidden <S%G2927>things<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> will make <S%G5319>manifest<s%> the <S%G1012>counsels<s%> of the <S%G2588>hearts<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1096>shall<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G1096>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, I have in a figure <S%G3345>transferred<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sakes<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> you might <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G5426>think<s%> of men <S%G5228>above<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of you be puffed <S%G5448>up<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1252>makes<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> to <S%G1252>differ<s%> from <S%G1161>another<s%>? and <S%G5101>what<s%> have <S%G2192>you<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> you <S%G2983>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%>? <S%G1161>now<s%> <S%G1487%G99999>if<s%> you did <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5101>it<s%>, why do you <S%G2744>glory<s%>, as <S%G5613>if<s%> you <S%G2983>had<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> received <S%G2983>it<s%>?

<S%G2235>Now<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2880>full<s%>, <S%G2235>now<s%> you are <S%G4147>rich<s%>, you have reigned as <S%G936>kings<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I would to <S%G3785%G99999>God<s%> you did <S%G936>reign<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> might <S%G4821>reign<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has set <S%G584>forth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%>, as it <S%G5613>were<s%> appointed to <S%G1935>death<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G2302>spectacle<s%> unto the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G2249>We<s%> are <S%G3474>fools<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s sake, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> are <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G772>weak<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> are <S%G2478>strong<s%>; <S%G5210>you<s%> are <S%G1741>honorable<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G820>despised<s%>.

Even <S%G891>unto<s%> this <S%G737>present<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3983>we<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3983>hunger<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1372>thirst<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1130>naked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G2852>buffeted<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have no certain <S%G790>dwellingplace<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%>, <S%G2038>working<s%> with our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>: being <S%G3058>reviled<s%>, we <S%G2127>bless<s%>; being <S%G1377>persecuted<s%>, we suffer <S%G430>it<s%>:

Being <S%G987>defamed<s%>, we <S%G3870>entreat<s%>: we are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4027>filth<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, and are the <S%G4067>scum<s%> on all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> this <S%G737>day<s%>.

I <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> to <S%G1788>shame<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>sons<s%> I warn <S%G3560>you<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> ten <S%G3463>thousand<s%> <S%G3807>instructers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> have you <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G1080>fathered<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>.
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of <S%G3450>me<s%>.

<S%G1223>For<s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> have I <S%G3992>sent<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> shall <S%G363>bring<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> into <S%G363>memory<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> which <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> I <S%G1321>teach<s%> every <S%G3837>where<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> are puffed <S%G5448>up<s%>, as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G2064>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G5030>shortly<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2309>wills<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G1097>know<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3056>speech<s%> of them <S%G3588>which<s%> are puffed <S%G5448>up<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>.

<S%G5101>What<s%> is <S%G2309>your<s%> <S%G2064>choice<s%>? Shall I come <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>meekness<s%>?
